rows.value: This sheet provides example of using row naming conventions to create data structures required for specific components

Any variable ending `_list` or containing `_list_` will be converted to a list

Lists use a `;` separator to separate array elements, e.g.
```
alice; bob
```
Additionally, lists can include key-value pairs separated by `|`
```
name: value_1 | text: my_text; 
name: value_2 | text: my text 2
```
rows.comments:
I believe the `|` was introduced to support legacy answer_lists, however we may want to rethink whether this syntax is consistent with other compoennts

https://github.com/IDEMSInternational/open-app-builder/pull/2211

rows.name: example_list_2
